events.message: I recently received my order, but I want to return it because it doesn't meet my expectations. How can I get a refund?
The reported issue involves a refund request based on customer's return inquiry.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah T. for further assistance with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can assist you better?
The order number is 12345AB. Iâ€™m returning the item because it is smaller than described on your website.
Thank you for the details. You can return the item using our prepaid shipping label. Once we receive the return, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
Thanks for explaining. The return process sounds clear and straightforward. I will send the item back tomorrow.
We have received your returned item and processed your refund. The amount should be reflected in your account shortly.
Just following up to confirm that you received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your return request.
This case is now closed. Please reach out again if you have any other questions or need further assistance.
